messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A thank you and a conference?
messages.msgSnippet: Well Kelly I asked Jonathan what he thought  of the conference and he said he thought everyone seemed to have a really good time. I know we did! ;-) Barb E I
messages.messageBody:
Well Kelly I asked Jonathan what he thought of the conference and he
said he thought everyone seemed to have a really good time. I know we did!
;-)

Barb E
"I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position
that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while
trying to succeed"-- Booker T. Washington

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A thank you and a conference?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/4/03 4:18:16 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I asked my son to comment and he just said I don t know Mom it was all great.  For me it
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/4/03 4:18:16 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> Could anyone's child who attended last year comment here? Barb? Jolee? I
> don't know who else is here---anyone? Bueller?
>
>

I asked my son to comment and he just said "I don't know Mom it was all
great." For me it brought tears to my eyes to see other children like mine.
They fit in so easily and talked with each other and instantly started
playing with no gender or age separation. The adults all treated the
children with such respect. Not just their own children but all the
children. The children had freedom. Parents watching but not interfering.
Just allowing their children to explore. It was really great for my children
and when you see a room full of unschooled children you can really see how
they are different. Confident, with ideas and thoughts, questions and
answers.
Great for my boys.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
